img_summary: The image depicts a unique crafting material called "Golden Horn," which is part of the "Black Myth: Wukong" game. Positioned between descriptions of other special materials, it likely represents a rare or epic item used for crafting powerful gear or abilities. Its design features a golden horn resting on a twisted, wooden-like base, emphasizing its mystical and valuable nature. The preceding and following text suggests it plays a narrative role in the game's progression, obtained through defeating specific enemies or completing challenges in The Webbed Hollow.
